org.goobi.production.chart

Class ProjectStatusDraw

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.goobi.production.chart.ProjectStatusDraw

  • public class ProjectStatusDraw
extends Object
    ProjectStatusDraw class creates and paints the chart depending on given parameters. The value parameters are transferred as ProjectStatusDataTable-Object. Width and height have to be set as pixel values.
    Version:
    27.10.2009
    Author:
    Karsten Köhler, Hendrik Söhnholz, Steffen Hankiewicz

      • ProjectStatusDraw

        public ProjectStatusDraw(ProjectStatusDataTable inDataTable,
                         Graphics2D g2d,
                         int width,
                         int height)
        Instantiates a new ProjectStatusDraw.
        Parameters:
        inDataTable - the DataTable (contains the DataRow-objects)
        g2d - the Graphics2D-object, where to paint
        width - the width of the image
        height - the height of the image
